member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Messaging.IEventBus
member.summary: Unified interface for event bus operations combining publishing and subscribing. Provides a complete abstraction for in-memory event-driven communication.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Messaging.IEventPublisher
member.summary: Defines a publisher for application-level events using in-memory channels. Suitable for high-throughput, scalable event-driven architectures.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Messaging.IEventPublisher.PublishAsync``1(``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Publishes an event asynchronously to all subscribers of type T.
member.typeparam: The event type. Must be a reference type.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous publish operation.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Messaging.IEventSubscriber
member.summary: Defines a subscriber for application-level events using in-memory channels. Provides async enumerable streams for reactive event processing.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Messaging.IEventSubscriber.SubscribeAsync``1(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Subscribes to events of type T asynchronously. Returns an async enumerable stream that yields events as they are published.
member.typeparam: The event type to subscribe to. Must be a reference type.
member.param: Cancellation token to stop the subscription.
member.returns: An async enumerable stream of events of type T.

member.summary: Executes a SQL query designed to return a single row or null.

member.summary: Executes a SQL query and returns the first row or null.

member.summary: Executes a query and returns a single scalar value (e.g., COUNT, MAX, SUM).

member.summary: Checks if any rows exist for the given query.

member.summary: Gets the count of rows for the given query.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.LongCountAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the long count of rows for the given query (for tables with billions of rows).

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.GetPagedAsync``1(System.String,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.PaginationRequest,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a paginated SQL query with automatic count query. For SQL Server: Uses OFFSET-FETCH with optimized query plans. For PostgreSQL: Uses LIMIT-OFFSET with parallel query support. Filters and parameters are extracted from the PaginationRequest.Filters property.
member.param: Pagination parameters including sort, filters, and search

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.GetPagedAsync``1(System.String,System.String,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.PaginationRequest,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a paginated SQL query with a custom count query for complex scenarios. Use this when the count query needs to be different from the main query. Filters and parameters are extracted from the PaginationRequest.Filters property.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.GetPagedFromStoredProcedureAsync``1(System.String,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.PaginationRequest,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a paginated stored procedure that returns results and total count. Expects the stored procedure to have @PageIndex, @PageSize parameters and return both results and total count (via output parameter or second result set). Filters and parameters are extracted from the PaginationRequest.Filters property.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.GetFilteredAsync``1(System.String,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a filtered SQL query with sorting and search capabilities (non-paginated). Automatically builds parameters from FilterRequest and applies ORDER BY clause.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.GetFilteredFromStoredProcedureAsync``1(System.String,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a filtered stored procedure (non-paginated). Passes filter criteria to the stored procedure without pagination parameters.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.GetFilteredDataSetAsync(System.String,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest,Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a filtered query and returns a DataSet (non-paginated). Useful for reports that need multiple result sets with filtering and sorting.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.QueryMultipleAsync``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes multiple queries in a single batch for better performance. Returns multiple result sets.
Executes multiple non-query commands in a batch. Returns total affected rows.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Abstractions.Persistence.IAdoRepository.BulkInsertAsync``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Bulk insert data using optimized bulk copy operations. For SQL Server: Uses SqlBulkCopy. For PostgreSQL: Uses COPY command.

member.summary: Streams query results as an async enumerable for memory-efficient processing. Ideal for processing large datasets without loading all into memory.

member.summary: Gets the detected device type for the current request.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for controlling pagination metadata exposure. Allows fine-grained control over what metadata is returned in PagedResult.

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.IncludeQuerySource
member.summary: Include query source information (e.g., stored procedure name, raw query indicator). ⚠️ Security: Set to false in production to avoid exposing implementation details. Default: false (secure by default)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.IncludeStoredProcedureName
member.summary: Include stored procedure names in metadata. ⚠️ Security: Only enable in development/staging environments. Default: false (secure by default)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.IncludePerformanceMetrics
member.summary: Include performance metrics (query duration, count duration). Generally safe to expose, useful for monitoring. Default: true

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.IncludeFilterInfo
member.summary: Include filter and search information. Generally safe, helps clients understand the results. Default: true

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.IncludeSortInfo
member.summary: Include sorting information. Generally safe, helps clients understand the results. Default: true

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.IncludeAppliedFilters
member.summary: Include applied filters details (for debugging). ⚠️ Security: May expose sensitive filter values. Default: false (secure by default)

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Configuration.PaginationMetadataOptions.Validate(System.String)
member.summary: Validate configuration on startup. Logs warnings if insecure settings are detected in production.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Constants.ApiMetadataKeys
member.summary: Metadata keys for API-level response metadata (tracing, correlation, versioning, etc.). For pagination-specific metadata, see .

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Constants.DebugMetadataKeys
member.summary: Metadata keys for debug/diagnostic information in error responses. These should only be included in Development environment or when explicitly enabled.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Constants.HealthCheckMetadataKeys
member.summary: Metadata keys for health check responses and diagnostics.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Constants.PaginationMetadataKeys
member.summary: Metadata keys specifically for pagination-related information in PagedResult. Use these constants to ensure consistency across all paged query implementations.

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.CommandOptionsDto.UseJsonFilters
member.summary: Controls filter parameter strategy: - false (default): Individual parameters for raw SQL (better performance) - true: JSON serialized parameters for stored procedures (flexibility) - null: Auto-detect based on CommandType (JSON for StoredProcedure)

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest
member.summary: Request model for filtering, sorting, and searching without pagination. Ideal for reports, exports, simple searches, and scenarios where all matching results are needed.

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.SearchTerm
member.summary: General search term to filter results.

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.Filters
member.summary: Dictionary of additional filters with dynamic key-value pairs. Keys represent filter field names, values represent filter values.

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.IsEmpty
member.summary: Indicates whether the filter is empty (no search term and no filters).

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.HasCriteria
member.summary: Indicates whether the filter has any criteria (search term or filters).

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.BuildFilters
member.summary: Builds a dictionary of filters if they exist, otherwise returns null. Useful for converting to stored procedure parameters or other filter formats.
member.returns: Dictionary of filters or null if no filters exist

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.BuildFiltersWithPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Builds a dictionary of filters with custom key prefix (e.g., "@" for SQL parameters).
member.param: Prefix to add to filter keys
member.returns: Dictionary of filters with prefixed keys or null if no filters exist

member.name: M:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.FilterRequest.BuildSqlParameters
member.summary: Builds a dictionary of filters with "@" prefix for SQL parameters.
member.returns: Dictionary of filters with "@" prefix or null if no filters exist

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.PaginationRequest
member.summary: Request model for paginated queries with filtering, sorting, and searching capabilities. Extends FilterRequest with pagination properties.

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.PaginationRequest.Skip
member.summary: Number of items to skip in the query (calculated from PageIndex and PageSize).

member.name: P:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Requests.PaginationRequest.Take
member.summary: Number of items to take in the query (same as PageSize).

member.name: T:Acontplus.Core.Dtos.Responses.LookupItem
member.summary: Represents a lookup item for dropdown lists, select boxes, and other UI components. Supports hierarchical structures via ParentId and custom ordering via DisplayOrder. All properties are nullable to support flexible SQL query mapping.

member.summary: Limpia caracteres especiales menor que y mayor que SOLO del contenido de texto entre etiquetas. NO modifica las etiquetas XML válidas. Usa un enfoque simple: reemplaza caracteres que NO son parte de etiquetas XML válidas.
